Item.method_code:
'inDom format: ' <Item type='Method' action='Schedule Project'> ' <body project_id='PROJECT_ID_VAL'/> ' </Item> ' OR ' <Item type='Project' id='PROJECT_ID_VAL'> ' .... ' </Item>
Dim i As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim projId As String Dim tmpNd As XmlElement If Me.node.getAttribute("type")="Method" Then tmpNd = CType(Me.node.selectSingleNode("body"), XmlElement) If IsNothing(tmpNd) Then Return i.newError("body is not specified") projId = tmpNd.getAttribute("project_id") Else projId = Me.node.getAttribute("id") End If Dim methNm As String = "PM_fireCustomProjectHook" Dim r As Item = i.applyMethod(methNm, String.Format("<body project_id='{0}' prop_name='scheduling_method'/>", System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(projId)))
'+++ scheduled dates are changed in the result project, thus reflect them +++ If Me.getAttribute("type")="Project" AndAlso Not r.IsError() Then Dim propNms() As String = {"date_start_sched", "date_due_sched"} Dim q As Item = i.newItem("tmp", "tmp") q.loadAML(String.Format("<Item type='Project' action='get' select='{0}' id='{1}' serverEvents='0'/>", System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(Join(propNms, ",")), System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(projId))) q = q.apply() If q.getItemCount()=1 Then q = q.getItemByIndex(0) Dim j As Integer Dim pn As String For j=0 To propNms.Length-1 pn = propNms(j) Me.setProperty(pn, q.getProperty(pn, "")) Next j End If End If '--- scheduled dates are changed in the result project, thus reflect them ---
Return r
Item.name: Schedule Project
